name: Arrokuda

evolution.description: Arrokuda can evolve into Barraskewda at level 7 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 11 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Rush Pokémon. If it sees any movement around it, this Pokémon charges for it straightaway, leading with its sharply pointed jaw. It's very proud of that jaw.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: This Pokémon's speed is doubled in rainy conditions.

abilities.name: Propeller Tail
abilities.description: This Pokémon's ignores the effects of moves that alters the targets of its own moves (such as Follow Me).
